testimonials.comment: Seth Kallis is an exceptional person and colleague, very down to earth. He grasps new ideas very quickly which makes him a very valuable asset to any organization that is lucky to have him.
Seth is quite a creative and open minded colleague that works well with the task at hand. He thinks of others without compromising his ethical integrity.
Seth is a fast learner. He is always eager and inclined to know more. He is a team player and can be a valuable asset to your company.
Seth is a hardworking person, is committed to the task at  hand and never let's anything get in his way. A hard-working person focused on growth, knowledge and is diligent worker.

Seth is a dedicated, creative, go-getter, and well-behaved student. He enjoys working with his classmates and works well on his project. He has gained knowledge of web development, including Bootstrap 5. I will be very delighted to see him get hired as a developer.
